posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cy Young Glove Shows Old Mill PSA 2.5
posts.post_content: **SOLD** Selling a T206 Cy Young Glove Shows Old Mill PSA 2.5. Card is crease free and has exceptional color and clarity. Does have some corner wear and rounding. Low pop back here. Asking $1000 delivered OBO
